name: FNF - Vs. FL Chan Full Week
name_original: FNF - Vs. FL Chan Full Week
description:
Play FL Chan and her 3 new original songs

The executable is used for the stage itself. it loads certain animations, special code, and contains all the necessary offsets and positions for graphics such as:

-the tunnel background position
-the foreground train position
-the background train position
- GF's position
-BF's train animation
-GF's train animation
-subtle camera shaking
-camera zoom
-certain events where a certain animation is triggered

Run week 4 on story mode on normal mode to play the mod
